about_the_game: Sonic Origins Classic Music DLC Pack features additioinal re-mastered music tracks from the Sonic universe.
detailed_description: Sonic Origins Classic Music DLC Pack features additioinal re-mastered music tracks from the Sonic universe.
legal_notice: ⒸSEGA. All rights reserved. SEGA is registered in the U.S. Patent and Trademark Office. SEGA, the SEGA logo and SONIC ORIGINS are registered trademarks or trademarks of SEGA CORPORATION or its affiliates.
name: Sonic Origins - Classic Music Pack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2400, 3.1 GHz or AMD FX-8350, 4.2 GHz
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 750, 2 GB or AMD Radeon HD 7790, 2 GB
  • Additional Notes: 720p @ 60 FPS
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4570, 3.2 GHz or AMD Ryzen 3 1300X, 3.4 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 770, 2 GB or AMD Radeon R9 280, 3 GB
  • Additional Notes: 1080p @ 60FPS

supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Korean, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese
